org.irri.iric.portal

Class AppContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.irri.iric.portal.AppContext

  • public class AppContext
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides application-wide access to the Spring ApplicationContext. The ApplicationContext is injected by the class "ApplicationContextProvider". Used to define global parameters, will be updated from *.xml file later

    • Field Summary
